title: My thoughts on what feels different since season 5
body:
I know what the problem is in league, but i cant put it into words. Its not just damage, or toxicity. Its like i can feel it, i can feel the unsatisfactory feeling after each game.

Its like that horrible feeling where you have to win to not feel bad, but you don't feel any better when you do.

And when you loose, its horrible not only because of people blaming you or others, but the fact that it might have been nearly impossible to make a comeback or the enemies rub victory in your face.

Not to mention you wasted most of your 20 - 40 minutes trying to have fun only to be killed instantly and respawn in 30 seconds time after time after time again.

The only thing that keeps me here is my favorite mains, bot modes and skins.

And the occasional awesome player i meet every once in a while.
